Package com.foreach.across.core.context.support

Class ModuleSetBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.context.support.ModuleSetBuilder
public class ModuleSetBuilder extends Object
Helper that builds a ModuleSet. Should be deprecated in the future, replace by AcrossModuleDescriptorSetBuilder
Author:
Arne Vandamme
